name: Expert Laser Man
description:
Expert Laser Man is a one-level "pilot/preview" 2d 8-bit video game. You play as an emboldened IT guy who is on a quest to save his office from printers, copiers, and fax machines that have become sentient through AI and are attempting to destroy all humans.

The game was designed by executive producer Nathan Dube (Alchemy Studioz) and brought to life in partnership with Guerilla Tactics video game studio in Amherst, MA.

You can play this game in your browser or download it for windows or mac (desktop only).

If we get enough players, we are hoping to build a full game with multiple levels, weapons, and additional features via crowdfunding.

Music by: Nathan Dube

Controls:

A: Left

D: Right

S: Crouch

Spacebar: Jump

Mouse: Laser blast

NOTE: While you can use a touch-pad mouse button to shoot your laser, using a mouse will provide a much smoother experience and functionality.
